alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 3:43PM EDT until June 12 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON AND NORTHEASTERN CALHOUN COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA...GADSDEN AND NORTH CENTRAL LIBERTY COUNTIES IN BIG BEND OF FLORIDA...DECATUR AND CENTRAL SEMINOLE COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN GEORGIA... At 343 PM EDT/243 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles south of Donalsonville to 10 miles southwest of Chattahoochee, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Quincy, Greensboro, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Gretna, Grand Ridge, Attapulgus, Brinson, Rock Bluff, Ocheesee, Juniper, Douglas City, Selman, Florence, Recovery, Laingkat, Quincy Airport and Sawdust. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
